maintainedAverage.information: Illuminance level lighting installations aim to provide.
maintainedAverage.tooltipSummary: Illuminance level lighting installations aim to provide.

uniformityRatio.information: Ratio of minimum to average or maximum illuminance.
uniformityRatio.tooltipSummary: Ratio of minimum to average or maximum illuminance.

UGR.information: Standard SS-EN 12565-1, ljus och rum. Variables between 10(best)-30(worst). Assumption: Glare needs to be avoided to ensure a good working environment. A glare rating lower than standard is desired.
UGR.tooltipSummary: Unified Glare Rating (UGR) - Numerical measure of glare in a particular environment.

CRI.information: Measure of light source's ability to reveal colors accurately.
CRI.tooltipSummary: Measure of light source's ability to reveal colors accurately.

CCT.information: Color appearance of light emitted by a lamp.
CCT.tooltipSummary: Color appearance of light emitted by a lamp.

Duv.information: Deviation from the black-body line in color space.
Duv.tooltipSummary: Deviation from the black-body line in color space.

SVM.information: The Hz corresponds to Stroboscopic Visibility Measure (SVM) - a measure of visibility of stroboscopic effects.
SVM.tooltipSummary: Flicker. Stroboscopic Visibility Measure (SVM) - Measure of visibility of stroboscopic effects.
